site_title: Chuck Finn by Michael G. LaFosse

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 23 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Chuck Finn designed by Michael G. LaFosse. This paper airplane is flown in a very special way. To fly, you need to toss in the air and it will slowly glide back down This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 022 : Avion F-5 by Carlos Pomaron", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/IlY4vm9_V5c Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching.
